programme.title: Homemade-ish
programme.desc: Last minute company leaving you in a pinch? Frankie has you covered with these easy recipes featuring store bought staples. With a few Struggle tips, these basic ingredients can be transformed into dishes that will impress your guests.

programme.title: Piece Of The Pie
programme.desc: There may be infinite ways to define pie, but the only math that matters is what makes these sweet and savory dishes fit the bill. In true Struggle Style, Frankie rolls out his best tips and tricks for enjoying hassle free, cost friendly pies.

programme.title: The Big Game
programme.desc: Brackets are complete and all thats missing is food to fuel your teams run. Huddle around the kitchen as Frankie preps the ultimate watch party spread. These savory, spicy and sweet dishes are championship-worthy even if your bracket goes bust.

programme.title: Bananas For Bananas
programme.desc: As one of the cheapest members of the produce aisle, bananas will save you bunches of money when you whip up these delightfully appealing recipes that go above and beyond a basic bread.

programme.title: Cry Me An Allium River
programme.desc: Frankie takes on his longtime frenemy, the onion, and all its powerful relatives. There might be a few tears shed along the way, but they are well worth the delicious and flavorful results, from sweet buttery leeks to the ultimate onion masterpiece.

programme.title: Wrap it Up!
programme.desc: First, Frankie packs a one-two punch of bargain and nutrition with butternut squash in three nostalgic, old school dishes. Then he shows you how to prep portable wraps at home for easy, peasey lunches.

programme.title: Bacon My Heart
programme.desc: Versatility is important. These three items - bacon, eggs, and a whole chicken - will feed you a plethora of delicious meals... and for cheap!

programme.title: Instant Gratification
programme.desc: Everyone loves carbs! Endlessly versatile, cheap, and super filling - Frankie shows you tricks for pasta, pizza dough, and delicious, easy ramen meals that arent soup.

programme.title: Cauliflowers Star Power
programme.desc: Cauliflower is a star and can be transformed into unexpected dishes. Plus its delicious and nutritious! Frankie reminds us to buy dried-goods in bulk and makes a big chuck roast that stretches over three dishes.

programme.title: Traveling for Your Tastebuds
programme.desc: You dont have to travel half way around the world to try a different cuisine - Italian and Filipino foods are accessible right here, right now.

programme.title: Street Food Faves at Home
programme.desc: Frankie makes street food at home. Its fresher, healthier, and cheaper! Then - get ready! - because youve never seen rice like this before.

programme.title: 100th Episode
programme.desc: Frankie celebrates the 100th episode of Struggle Meals with a look back on memorable moments, favorite recipes, bloopers and cooking mishaps. Take a peek behind the scenes, hear from the audience, and celebrate with a special surprise guest.

programme.title: Game Day
programme.desc: Frankie throws a game day party for under $25. He makes three no-fuss appetizers that are cheaper, healthier, and tastier than subpar game day take out. So gather around with friends and cheer on your favorite teams. Or just eat. Both are a win.

programme.title: Winter is Here
programme.desc: Its the dead of winter in Frankies kitchen, which means its that time for hearty, delicious, and warming homemade meals. So youre saving more money, while youre staying in, already saving money. Its a winter miracle.

programme.title: Valentines Day
programme.desc: Frankie prepares a Valentines Day dinner for under $15. Why go to a crowded restaurant for an overpriced prix-fixe menu when you can prep a simple yet decadent romantic meal at home? Itll be sweet, itll be aphrodisiacal, and itll be sexy cheap.

programme.title: Beans Beans Beans
programme.desc: Frankie will teach the basics of preparing beans from scratch while making super tasty recipes. Beans are the gift that keeps on giving, so dont be scared to eat too many. Remember, theyre good for your heart.

programme.title: Rent Week
programme.desc: Its the first of the month, when you spend your whole paycheck on rent and bills. Your fridge is looking pretty sad and the grocery budget is low. Frankie cooks up some go-to pantry meals and teaches us how to better prep for this time of the month.

programme.title: Mushroom Mania
programme.desc: Frankie takes us on a magical mushroom trip. Theyre an affordable plant-based meat replacement, packed with nutritional value. Well learn all things mushrooms and how to make inventive, flavorful dishes that might trip you out on their awesomeness.

programme.title: No Kitchen No Problem
programme.desc: Frankie teaches us a few easy and inventive no-kitchen hacks for delicious struggly meals. If youre dorm living or road tripping, it doesnt mean you cant make tasty meals from handy kitchen (and non-kitchen) appliances. No Kitchen? No problem.

programme.title: Spring Fling
programme.desc: Frankie teaches us how to cook with mother nature, spring-style. Its tasty, seasonably affordable, and pretty to look at. Its time to spring into action with these delicious meals that are light on your plate and your wallet.

programme.title: Spice Is Nice
programme.desc: Flavor, flavor, flavor. Frankie shows us the way around the spice cabinet. All it takes is a couple primary dried spices to make a variety of homemade spice blends. Bonus: Frankie also tackles a monster challenge with our favorite monster guest!

programme.title: Root-to-Stem
programme.desc: Frankie teaches us how to use whole vegetables, from root-to-stem, which means no food goes to waste. Learn how to use vegetable stalks you would normally throw away. Root-to-stem cooking: less waste, more food, and more nutrition. Frankies favorite

programme.title: Holiday Flavors
programme.desc: The holiday season looks different this year, so why not mix things up and celebrate classic flavors in new and unexpected ways. Frankie teaches us to put a twist on all your holiday favorites, using simple ingredients for your loved ones to enjoy.

programme.title: Less Stress Holidays
programme.desc: The holidays are hectic enough, and with more planning, cooking and cleaning than usual, everyone wants to shop smart and save time. Frankie tackles weekday meals that will keep you organized, fed, and less stressed this season.

programme.title: 100th Episode
programme.desc: Frankie celebrates the 100th episode of Struggle Meals with a look back on memorable moments, favorite recipes, bloopers and cooking mishaps. Take a peek behind the scenes, hear from the audience, and celebrate with a special surprise guest.

programme.title: Pizza My Heart
programme.desc: On this special delivery episode of Struggle Meals, Frankie explores three ways to make delicious pizzas, and shares clever tips to make an A+ pie without dropping your dough on expensive ingredients.

programme.title: French Bistro
programme.desc: Bonsoir, indeed! Join Frankie as he cooks up elegant but achievable French classics that will transport you to an evening on the Seine, complete with some savvy wine tips without the hefty cost of a plane ticket.

programme.title: Thanksgiving Dinner
programme.desc: Thanksgiving dinner will be a breeze this year thanks to Frankies struggle tips for a delicious holiday meal. From a simple turkey entree to a new twist on a classic dessert, Frankie makes a feast without unstuffing his wallet.

programme.title: Meatless Mains
programme.desc: Start a new tradition at the dinner table this year with a meat free spin on your favorite main courses. Learn new tips and tricks to make your veggie forward dinner so delightful that even the biggest meat eaters will be back for seconds.

programme.title: Spice Spice Baby
programme.desc: Frankie kicks it up a notch in the Struggle Kitchen with flavor-packed, spicy recipes, and some hot tips for adding layers of flavor. But dont sweat it, these warming dishes wont burn your cash or your tastebuds.

programme.title: Easy Meals For A Crowd
programme.desc: Finicky family coming to town? Fear not, for Frankies sharing all the struggle tips and tricks to keep the stress levels low and the enjoyment high with simple, delicious meals to please everyone at the table.

programme.title: Holiday Sweet Treats
programme.desc: Tis the jolly season of giving, but this year, there will be no more struggles in making your list and checking it twice. Frankies festive, budget-friendly treats are the sweetest way to tell your friends and family you love them.

programme.title: Homemade For The Holidays
programme.desc: Theres no better way to spread some holiday spirit than at the dinner table with these decadent, festive recipes that can make any long, dark night feel warm and merry. Best of all, they wont freeze your bank account.

programme.title: Chinese Take Out
programme.desc: With the help of a friend, Frankie serves up easy and delicious recipes based on take out favorites everyone will enjoy at home. No need to shell out extra cash for delivery fees!

programme.title: New Years Party
programme.desc: Wow your party guests this New Years Eve by serving these fancy but frugal dishes to ring in the year right. From appetizers to mocktails, everyone will enjoy your spread!

programme.title: 100th Episode
programme.desc: Frankie celebrates the 100th episode of Struggle Meals with a look back on memorable moments, favorite recipes, bloopers and cooking mishaps. Take a peek behind the scenes, hear from the audience, and celebrate with a special surprise guest.

programme.desc: Frankie celebrates the 100th episode of Struggle Meals with a look back on memorable moments, favorite recipes, bloopers and cooking mishaps. Take a peek behind the scenes, hear from the audience, and celebrate with a special surprise guest.

programme.title: Easy Meals For A Crowd
programme.desc: Finicky family coming to town? Fear not, for Frankies sharing all the struggle tips and tricks to keep the stress levels low and the enjoyment high with simple, delicious meals to please everyone at the table.

programme.title: Holiday Sweet Treats
programme.desc: Tis the jolly season of giving, but this year, there will be no more struggles in making your list and checking it twice. Frankies festive, budget-friendly treats are the sweetest way to tell your friends and family you love them.

programme.title: Homemade For The Holidays
programme.desc: Theres no better way to spread some holiday spirit than at the dinner table with these decadent, festive recipes that can make any long, dark night feel warm and merry. Best of all, they wont freeze your bank account.

programme.title: Beans Beans Beans
programme.desc: Frankie will teach the basics of preparing beans from scratch while making super tasty recipes. Beans are the gift that keeps on giving, so dont be scared to eat too many. Remember, theyre good for your heart.

programme.title: Rent Week
programme.desc: Its the first of the month, when you spend your whole paycheck on rent and bills. Your fridge is looking pretty sad and the grocery budget is low. Frankie cooks up some go-to pantry meals and teaches us how to better prep for this time of the month.

programme.title: Mushroom Mania
programme.desc: Frankie takes us on a magical mushroom trip. Theyre an affordable plant-based meat replacement, packed with nutritional value. Well learn all things mushrooms and how to make inventive, flavorful dishes that might trip you out on their awesomeness.

programme.title: No Kitchen No Problem
programme.desc: Frankie teaches us a few easy and inventive no-kitchen hacks for delicious struggly meals. If youre dorm living or road tripping, it doesnt mean you cant make tasty meals from handy kitchen (and non-kitchen) appliances. No Kitchen? No problem.

programme.title: Spring Fling
programme.desc: Frankie teaches us how to cook with mother nature, spring-style. Its tasty, seasonably affordable, and pretty to look at. Its time to spring into action with these delicious meals that are light on your plate and your wallet.

programme.title: Spice Is Nice
programme.desc: Flavor, flavor, flavor. Frankie shows us the way around the spice cabinet. All it takes is a couple primary dried spices to make a variety of homemade spice blends. Bonus: Frankie also tackles a monster challenge with our favorite monster guest!

programme.title: Root-to-Stem
programme.desc: Frankie teaches us how to use whole vegetables, from root-to-stem, which means no food goes to waste. Learn how to use vegetable stalks you would normally throw away. Root-to-stem cooking: less waste, more food, and more nutrition. Frankies favorite

programme.title: Holiday Flavors
programme.desc: The holiday season looks different this year, so why not mix things up and celebrate classic flavors in new and unexpected ways. Frankie teaches us to put a twist on all your holiday favorites, using simple ingredients for your loved ones to enjoy.

programme.title: Pizza My Heart
programme.desc: On this special delivery episode of Struggle Meals, Frankie explores three ways to make delicious pizzas, and shares clever tips to make an A+ pie without dropping your dough on expensive ingredients.

programme.title: French Bistro
programme.desc: Bonsoir, indeed! Join Frankie as he cooks up elegant but achievable French classics that will transport you to an evening on the Seine, complete with some savvy wine tips without the hefty cost of a plane ticket.

programme.title: Thanksgiving Dinner
programme.desc: Thanksgiving dinner will be a breeze this year thanks to Frankies struggle tips for a delicious holiday meal. From a simple turkey entree to a new twist on a classic dessert, Frankie makes a feast without unstuffing his wallet.

programme.title: Meatless Mains
programme.desc: Start a new tradition at the dinner table this year with a meat free spin on your favorite main courses. Learn new tips and tricks to make your veggie forward dinner so delightful that even the biggest meat eaters will be back for seconds.

programme.title: 100th Episode
programme.desc: Frankie celebrates the 100th episode of Struggle Meals with a look back on memorable moments, favorite recipes, bloopers and cooking mishaps. Take a peek behind the scenes, hear from the audience, and celebrate with a special surprise guest.

programme.title: Game Day
programme.desc: Frankie throws a game day party for under $25. He makes three no-fuss appetizers that are cheaper, healthier, and tastier than subpar game day take out. So gather around with friends and cheer on your favorite teams. Or just eat. Both are a win.

programme.title: Winter is Here
programme.desc: Its the dead of winter in Frankies kitchen, which means its that time for hearty, delicious, and warming homemade meals. So youre saving more money, while youre staying in, already saving money. Its a winter miracle.

programme.title: Valentines Day
programme.desc: Frankie prepares a Valentines Day dinner for under $15. Why go to a crowded restaurant for an overpriced prix-fixe menu when you can prep a simple yet decadent romantic meal at home? Itll be sweet, itll be aphrodisiacal, and itll be sexy cheap.

programme.title: Warm + Cozy Winter
programme.desc: Frankie gets cozy in the Struggle kitchen with recipes that bring all the warmth, flavor and joy during the coldest days of winter. From a casual weekday dinner to a special weekend meal, these dishes are sure to keep you warm and cozy.

programme.title: Eggscellent Techniques
programme.desc: In this special technique episode, Frankie teaches us several methods for cooking a quintessential ingredient: eggs. The scramble, the omelet, the Benedict learn to make them just the way you like them.

programme.title: Vintage
programme.desc: Frankie cooks his way back in time with his favorite vintage recipes. These oldie-but-goodie dishes are not only nostalgic and comforting, but theyll also fill you up without costing you a pretty penny.

programme.title: Struggle Soup
programme.desc: Warm and hearty bowls of veggies, beans, pasta, and more, these soups will have you returning for seconds all year round. Frankies soup blueprints can turn everyday ingredients into extraordinary soups, with endless flavor opportunity.

programme.title: Struggle Sandwich
programme.desc: In a sandwich, every component plays a role. With a supporting cast of fixins, and Frankies cost-saving homemade twists, these sandwiches just might steal the show.

programme.title: Cabbage, cabbage, cabbage
programme.desc: Cabbage has long been an underrated green on the field, and its about time Frankie gives it a starring role. This leafy head proves itself as the versatile ingredient we need it to be, affordable year around, delicious and filling.

programme.title: Mayo: The Secret Ingredient
programme.desc: Who knew mayo could be such a savvy secret agent? Its a controversial condiment that can unlock the buttery, crispy, decadent codes of our favorite dishes, without leaving a trace of mayo-ness. Best of all, its easy to make at home!

programme.title: Crunchy
programme.desc: Reaching textural nirvana is never easy, but Frankie explores several ways to achieve the perfect crunch in his dishes, both savory and sweet. Add this elusive element to your recipes without adding cost to your budget.

programme.title: A Cruciferous Delicious Time
programme.desc: No veggie family packs the same nutritious punch as the cruciferous family, and with a shelf life this long, theyve become a fixture in Frankies meal rotation. These delicious and easy-to-make recipes will win everyone over in no time.

programme.title: 5-Ingredient Recipes
programme.desc: Who said struggle meals cant be delicious? Dont sleep on these 5-ingredient recipes simple weeknight meals that are anything but boring, and with a few pantry staples, youll have dinner on the table in no time.

programme.title: 100th Episode
programme.desc: Frankie celebrates the 100th episode of Struggle Meals with a look back on memorable moments, favorite recipes, bloopers and cooking mishaps. Take a peek behind the scenes, hear from the audience, and celebrate with a special surprise guest.

programme.title: An Eggplant Extravaganza
programme.desc: Eggplant: A fruit you didnt know was a fruit. Often underrated and overlooked, Frankie shows us how to shop for and cook this filling, delicious, cost-effective, and versatile ingredient. The days of mushy, bitter eggplant will be long gone.

programme.title: Meat: More Bang For Your Buck
programme.desc: Its time to reduce the cost of meat on your grocery bill. Frankie shows us which cuts of meat provide the most bang for our buck, and equally as important, how to cook them for optimal flavor.

programme.title: Taste Selebriti
programme.desc: A food-travelogue program where 13 local celebrities will return to their hometowns to share traditional cuisines, unique foods and popular dishes in their states.

programme.title: Travel Lawak
programme.desc: Sebuah program travelog yang menampilkan tiga pelawak popular iaitu Syuk, Sharif Zero, dan Mamak Puteh di mana mereka akan mengembara ke luar negara.

programme.title: Semmaiyaana Saapadu
programme.desc: A mom and her daughters modernize traditional cooking with healthier versions of beloved recipes, serving up nostalgia with a nutritious twist.

programme.title: Kak Kek Ke Kelate
programme.desc: Join alter ego Catriona Ross as she uncovers the most popular dishes, iconic locations, hidden gems and, as always, the vibrant people on her travels throughout Kelantan.

programme.title: RASA Anak Emak Anak Bapak
programme.desc: Program masakan ini memerlukan selebriti jemputan membawa ibu atau bapa mereka menjelajah Malaysia bagi merasa sendiri masakan kegemaran ibu bapa masing-masing.

programme.title: Garden of Treasure
programme.desc: Buckle up as Darren takes us back on the road in this new season! Join him as he discovers herb gardens filled with treasures across Malaysias farms And markets - and scales the mountains of East Malaysia, searching for the medicinal herbs used by the aboriginal people And local Chinese.

programme.title: Its Okay!
programme.desc: In-young loses her mother in an accident and is kicked out by the landlord. Her chief choreographer has no choice but to bring her home. Facing adversity, the two gradually become closer.

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: A rookie basketball coach lead 6 no-body players for straight matches in 8 days and turn the impossible possible.

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: 6/45: Lucky Lotto
programme.desc: The excitement of winning a lottery ticket doesnt last long for sergeant Chun-woo as it accidentally ends up crossing the Military Demarcation Line. He must get his act together and find it again!

programme.title: Bear Man
programme.desc: Two bears from the Institute of techonolgy have turned into humans after eating garlic and mugwort. Yet, one has grown up into a police, while one has become a gangster...

programme.title: Citizen of a Kind
programme.desc: Duk-hee receives a call from a bank offering a loan. After sending money for fees, she realizes that was a scam. She receives another call one day. This time, its a plea for help...

programme.title: Okay! Madam
programme.desc: A married couple unwittingly become involved in a rescue operation of a hijacked aircraft during their first-ever family trip abroad to Hawaii.

programme.title: Honeysweet
programme.desc: Chi-ho is a successful product designer. Il-young works in a loan company. They meet at her company when he try to pay his brothers debt. Coincidence brings them to become closer.

programme.title: Switch
programme.desc: The life of a top star actor was turned upside down when he meets a taxi driver on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat the Devils Tattoo
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: A Year-end Medley
programme.desc: From awkward first love to crush on a friend and long forgotten love, 14 love-struck individuals are brought together at Hotel Emross on New Years Eve.

programme.title: Big Match
programme.desc: A man framed for murder battles a game planner who is intent on turning a city into one giant game board that he can control.

programme.title: Homeward Bound
programme.desc: Jung-has peaceful life changes when her son Jin-woo, who studies in Canada, and his girlfriend Jenny show up. They are forced to live together after a mishap with their lodging, and secrets surface.

programme.title: aespa: WORLD TOUR in cinemas
programme.desc: Witness aespas first world tour with futuristic stage visuals, high-energy choreography and captivating vocals. Exclusive behind-the-scenes interviews offer a glimpse behind the curtain.

programme.title: Hear Me: Our Summer
programme.desc: Yong-jun is working as a delivery man when he meets and instantly falls for Yeo-reum, the devoted sister of a gifted deaf swimmer. Yeo-reum slowly opens her heart to warm-hearted Yong-jun.

programme.title: Citizen of a Kind
programme.desc: Duk-hee receives a call from a bank offering a loan. After sending money for fees, she realizes that was a scam. She receives another call one day. This time, its a plea for help...

programme.title: Veteran
programme.desc: A merciless detective hunts down a young and successful drug addict who always escapes from investigations with the help of his wealth and connections.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: A North Korean soldier, Kyu-nam, embarks on an escape for a better future, while a State Security officer, Hyun-sang, relentlessly pursues him to protect the present in a deadly chase.

programme.title: Midnight Runners
programme.desc: Two students from Korean National Police University decide to work together and track down a kidnapping incident.

programme.title: The Snitch
programme.desc: Kang-soo was falsely accused and imprisoned. A prosecutor offered him a deal to be a snitch in exchange for a reduced sentence and Kang-soo starts to shake up the drug investigation...

programme.title: The Childe
programme.desc: A Kopino boxer goes to Korea to search for his estranged father for his mothers surgery, but his surroundings have turned into a mess after he met a mysterious man known as Nobleman...

programme.title: Steel Rain: Summit
programme.desc: A peace summit for Korea is derailed when the leaders of South Korea, North Korea and the U.S. are abducted by North Korean hardliners and held hostage in a submarine.

programme.title: Innocence
programme.desc: A hotshot lawyer uncovers the conspiracy of a small village while defending her estranged mother, who has Alzheimers disease and accused of killing the attendees at her husbands funeral.

programme.title: 6/45: Lucky Lotto
programme.desc: The excitement of winning a lottery ticket doesnt last long for sergeant Chun-woo as it accidentally ends up crossing the Military Demarcation Line. He must get his act together and find it again!

programme.title: Switch
programme.desc: The life of a top star actor was turned upside down when he meets a taxi driver on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E37
programme.desc: Ezequiel rechazado por Camila, la manipula con una nueva oferta de trabajo como asistente de su hija Julia y todo para tratar de conseguir su cercana. Max, confa en el amor de Camila. Torrealba pide que unan esfuerzos para encontrar a Rosa Blanco.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E38
programme.desc: Ante las intenciones de Ezequiel, Octavia y Marcelina agreden verbalmente a Camila. Max le propone y Camila duda pero accede a casarse con el. En una cena, Ezequiel rene a sus hijos y Camila ser la homenajeada especial.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E57
programme.desc: En una mezcla de disfrute y dolor, Pastora comprueba que el cadver de Cirilo reposa en la morgue.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E58
programme.desc: Lara Portillo dispone comprar unas pruebas de ADN que digan que la joven no lleva en sus venas la sangre de ninguno de los Santa Mara.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E57
programme.desc: Omar va a proceder al arresto de Lorena, pero Claudio interviene. En el apartamento de Isabel, Patricia exige que las mujeres le digan toda la verdad de lo que paso; tanto Malena como Isabel mantienen la version acordada; la abogada piensa que algo le ocultan- Gertrudis, festiva, gloriosa, le informa a Norma que pronto se casar con Claudio - Paulina pone a Don Lucio al tanto de lo que est ocurriendo con Virginia.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E54
programme.desc: Intentando zafarse de la locura de Cesar Adriana le pide al joven que se marche pero el hombre le exige que le diga cundo regresar a su lado.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E55
programme.desc: Despues de conversar con Carlos Ral, Adriana llega deshecha a su casa cuando es sorprendida por Cristian, quien saca un revolver y la amenaza para que se vaya con el.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E56
programme.desc: Adriana llega a casa de los Perroni y all Cristian la recibe con un apasionado beso, mientras que Carlos Ral los observa con dolor.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E019
programme.desc: Fernanda impide que Nicols siga espiando la conversacion entre Jons y Builder. Una emocionada Antonieta comenta con Fernanda que existe la posibilidad de salir en la pelcula que va a filmar Jack aunque sea como extra, cosa que la hace muy feliz, pues todas sus amigas de la alta sociedad se van a morir de envidia.Victoria se finge furiosa ante Adelaida al recibir un ramo de flores que le enva Nicols, aunque, a solas, admite que se muere por perdonarlo.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E020
programme.desc: Eugenia se siente incomoda cuando Miguel evidencia que gusta de ella y asegura estar dispuesto a conquistarla. Clementina le entrega a Victoria un ramo de flores que acaba de traerle un mensajero y que le enva Builder; la joven Guanipa evidencia preferir el de Nicols. Nicols se presenta en casa de Carmencita a avisarle a Victoria lo ocurrido a Hilario; la muchacha advierte que ya estaba enterada y que a su padre no le paso nada antes de reprocharle el beso que le estuvo dando a Liliana esa maana y que ella vio en una foto. Nicols busca a Victoria en la universidad para asegurarle que est dispuesto a hacer cualquier cosa por reconquistarla, pues para el no existe ms nadie; Guanipa, orgullosa, lo trata con cierto desprecio y, frente a el, llama a Builder para aceptar la invitacion que le hiciera anteriormente.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E38
programme.desc: Ante las intenciones de Ezequiel, Octavia y Marcelina agreden verbalmente a Camila. Max le propone y Camila duda pero accede a casarse con el. En una cena, Ezequiel rene a sus hijos y Camila ser la homenajeada especial.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E39
programme.desc: En la cena, el tema principal ser Rosa Blanco. Ezequiel dice que esa mujer fue una oportunista que enamoro y se aprovecho de su hermano menor, Leoncio. Astrid ofende agregando que fue una prostituta, culpable de la guerra entre las dos familias por su relacion con Augusto Aragon y tambien con Leoncio Lopez.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E58
programme.desc: Lara Portillo dispone comprar unas pruebas de ADN que digan que la joven no lleva en sus venas la sangre de ninguno de los Santa Mara.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E59
programme.desc: Frente a los medicos, Pastora finge interes por la condicion de Clara Ines, Clara le toma con fuerza el brazo acusndola de lo que le ha pasado.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E58
programme.desc: Pedro, seguro de que Lorena fue su delatora, enva a dos de sus sicarios a hacerse cargo de la enfermera - Lorena va rumbo a la universidad, cuando una camioneta frena violentamente delante de ella y se bajan Quique y Emilio, los secuaces de Pedro, con el rostro cubierto con unos pasamontaas; con pericia someten a la joven y luego se pierden a toda velocidad. Lorena ha sido secuestrada.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E59
programme.desc: Luego de ser sometida y secuestrada, ya dentro de la camioneta, Lorena se encuentra de frente con Pedro Lobo quien la acusa de traidora; ella sabe que est en peligro de muerte. Alberto y su to llegan al anticuario; al ver a este ltimo la empleada intenta avisarle a Pedro, pero Claudio se adelanta y se muestra como un cliente cualquiera que pisa por primera vez la tienda.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E55
programme.desc: Despues de conversar con Carlos Ral, Adriana llega deshecha a su casa cuando es sorprendida por Cristian, quien saca un revolver y la amenaza para que se vaya con el.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E59
programme.desc: Frente a los medicos, Pastora finge interes por la condicion de Clara Ines, Clara le toma con fuerza el brazo acusndola de lo que le ha pasado.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E58
programme.desc: Pedro, seguro de que Lorena fue su delatora, enva a dos de sus sicarios a hacerse cargo de la enfermera - Lorena va rumbo a la universidad, cuando una camioneta frena violentamente delante de ella y se bajan Quique y Emilio, los secuaces de Pedro, con el rostro cubierto con unos pasamontaas; con pericia someten a la joven y luego se pierden a toda velocidad. Lorena ha sido secuestrada.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E59
programme.desc: Luego de ser sometida y secuestrada, ya dentro de la camioneta, Lorena se encuentra de frente con Pedro Lobo quien la acusa de traidora; ella sabe que est en peligro de muerte. Alberto y su to llegan al anticuario; al ver a este ltimo la empleada intenta avisarle a Pedro, pero Claudio se adelanta y se muestra como un cliente cualquiera que pisa por primera vez la tienda.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E55
programme.desc: Despues de conversar con Carlos Ral, Adriana llega deshecha a su casa cuando es sorprendida por Cristian, quien saca un revolver y la amenaza para que se vaya con el.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E56
programme.desc: Adriana llega a casa de los Perroni y all Cristian la recibe con un apasionado beso, mientras que Carlos Ral los observa con dolor.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E019
programme.desc: Fernanda impide que Nicols siga espiando la conversacion entre Jons y Builder. Una emocionada Antonieta comenta con Fernanda que existe la posibilidad de salir en la pelcula que va a filmar Jack aunque sea como extra, cosa que la hace muy feliz, pues todas sus amigas de la alta sociedad se van a morir de envidia.Victoria se finge furiosa ante Adelaida al recibir un ramo de flores que le enva Nicols, aunque, a solas, admite que se muere por perdonarlo.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E020
programme.desc: Eugenia se siente incomoda cuando Miguel evidencia que gusta de ella y asegura estar dispuesto a conquistarla. Clementina le entrega a Victoria un ramo de flores que acaba de traerle un mensajero y que le enva Builder; la joven Guanipa evidencia preferir el de Nicols. Nicols se presenta en casa de Carmencita a avisarle a Victoria lo ocurrido a Hilario; la muchacha advierte que ya estaba enterada y que a su padre no le paso nada antes de reprocharle el beso que le estuvo dando a Liliana esa maana y que ella vio en una foto. Nicols busca a Victoria en la universidad para asegurarle que est dispuesto a hacer cualquier cosa por reconquistarla, pues para el no existe ms nadie; Guanipa, orgullosa, lo trata con cierto desprecio y, frente a el, llama a Builder para aceptar la invitacion que le hiciera anteriormente.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E38
programme.desc: Ante las intenciones de Ezequiel, Octavia y Marcelina agreden verbalmente a Camila. Max le propone y Camila duda pero accede a casarse con el. En una cena, Ezequiel rene a sus hijos y Camila ser la homenajeada especial.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E39
programme.desc: En la cena, el tema principal ser Rosa Blanco. Ezequiel dice que esa mujer fue una oportunista que enamoro y se aprovecho de su hermano menor, Leoncio. Astrid ofende agregando que fue una prostituta, culpable de la guerra entre las dos familias por su relacion con Augusto Aragon y tambien con Leoncio Lopez.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E58
programme.desc: Lara Portillo dispone comprar unas pruebas de ADN que digan que la joven no lleva en sus venas la sangre de ninguno de los Santa Mara.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E56
programme.desc: Adriana llega a casa de los Perroni y all Cristian la recibe con un apasionado beso, mientras que Carlos Ral los observa con dolor.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E57
programme.desc: En casa de los Perroni, Adriana le agradece a Carlos Ral lo que ha hecho por ella pero le suplica que se aleje de su vida.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E020
programme.desc: Eugenia se siente incomoda cuando Miguel evidencia que gusta de ella y asegura estar dispuesto a conquistarla. Clementina le entrega a Victoria un ramo de flores que acaba de traerle un mensajero y que le enva Builder; la joven Guanipa evidencia preferir el de Nicols. Nicols busca a Victoria en la universidad para asegurarle que est dispuesto a hacer cualquier cosa por reconquistarla, pues para el no existe ms nadie; Guanipa, orgullosa, lo trata con cierto desprecio y, frente a el, llama a Builder para aceptar la invitacion que le hiciera anteriormente.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E021
programme.desc: Una vez que Hansen los deja a solas; Hilario avisa a Adelaida que la perdona y le exige que regrese a su lado. Yosmir se molesta cuando Eugenia asegura que cree que si van a poder ser amigos, pues siente que ya perdio la oportunidad de conquistarla. Victoria le pide a Carmencita que le lea las cartas para que le de algunas respuestas; la seora solo llega a decirle que hay dos hombres que la rondan, que uno de ellos oculta algo y que la nica manera en que va a lograr salvarse es perdonando. Hilario busca a Victoria para pedirle que lo perdone por haberla tratado mal cuando ella es lo ms bonito que tiene en su vida; la joven se conmueve de ver a su pap entristecido, pero se sorprende cuando le pide que le jure, que nunca ms va a ver a Nicols Del Casal.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E39
programme.desc: En la cena, el tema principal ser Rosa Blanco. Ezequiel dice que esa mujer fue una oportunista que enamoro y se aprovecho de su hermano menor, Leoncio. Astrid ofende agregando que fue una prostituta, culpable de la guerra entre las dos familias por su relacion con Augusto Aragon y tambien con Leoncio Lopez.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E40
programme.desc: Camila insiste en saber sobre su relacion familiar, piensa que pueda ser prima de Max. Ezequiel quiere despejar la duda de que podra ser su sobrina, interroga a la Madre Isabel que niega saberlo y tambien recurre a Marcelina que se lo confirma. Camila, protege a Chantal, una nia que vende flores.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E59
programme.desc: Frente a los medicos, Pastora finge interes por la condicion de Clara Ines, Clara le toma con fuerza el brazo acusndola de lo que le ha pasado.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E60
programme.desc: Tras recobrar el sentido, el doctor Bermdez le explica a Clara Ines que sufre del corazon. Inesperadamente Clara escucha los gritos de Elisa.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E59
programme.desc: Luego de ser sometida y secuestrada, ya dentro de la camioneta, Lorena se encuentra de frente con Pedro Lobo quien la acusa de traidora; ella sabe que est en peligro de muerte. Alberto y su to llegan al anticuario; al ver a este ltimo la empleada intenta avisarle a Pedro, pero Claudio se adelanta y se muestra como un cliente cualquiera que pisa por primera vez la tienda.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E60
programme.desc: Ricardo por primera vez se impone ante Paulina, defendiendo con firmeza lo que siente por Mara Bonita - Culminado el interrogatorio de Isabel, Janet le espeta que no cree en su inocencia ni en la de Malena Magda, por cuenta propia, decide y habla con Omar del video-confesion que grabo Lorena.

programme.desc: Adriana llega a casa de los Perroni y all Cristian la recibe con un apasionado beso, mientras que Carlos Ral los observa con dolor.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E39 - A Century Of The Queen Mother 100 Years In 100 Minutes
programme.desc: 100 years in 100 minutes

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E01 - Koala
programme.desc: This series is a unique look at the early life and development of young animals, edited and narrated from the viewpoint of the animals themselves. As children explore the wonders of animal life, their natural fascination will deepen into a true love and appreciation of animals. In the first episode we meet Koala.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E02 - Gazelle
programme.desc: We gazelles live on the Savannah in Africa. Mummy said, that the Savannah is a very dry place. My dad has big horns so he can fight to protect us because lions want to eat us. We must be careful even by the river because crocodiles are watching. We eat mainly dry grass and if its not too dry we dont need to drink much.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E03 - Sea Lion
programme.desc: We live in the ocean! Its huge and wet. But mainly we live on the ocean shore. Thats where all the seal families make their home. What we love the most is swimming! Water is the greatest fun in the world. We have no problem staying in the water for hours at a time. Together with dolphins, we love to jump into the waves. Look at us go! Isnt that awesome?

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E04 - Brumby
programme.desc: I am a wild horse who lives in Australia. We were born to run and the difference between me and a farm horse is that I can run freely where I want. I meet with my friends the donkeys and lizards at waterholes which are very precious for us. But watch out! We dont like to be pushed around or feel threatened.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E05 - Butterfly
programme.desc: We Monarch Butterflies have to chew our way from our egg to see the world. Bite by bite together, with my brothers and sisters we start to feed on the leaves. We dont have any parents but just know what to do. When we feel cold, hungry, or afraid, we feel the same way as you do. We travel a lot and are capable of eating much more than our own weight. Our life is definitely hard work.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E06 - Pelican
programme.desc: There are many pelicans in the world. We are Australian pelicans. But we dont live only in Australia. We also live in other parts of the world. Pelicans like to hunt together. We hunt as a team. We swim in the water in a flock making noise with our feet and wings, thats how we drive the fish into shallows where we easily catch them. Flying is very easy for us and our nests are built from grass stems.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E07 - Elephant
programme.desc: Unsere Heimat ist Afrika und wir haben auch Verwandte in Indien. Aber das hier ist Afrika. Wir haben viele Freunde, die hier mit uns leben. Seht ihr? Gazellen, Antilopen, Gnus....sie alle fressen nur, was aus dem Boden wachst. Elefanten lieben es, im Wasser und im Schlamm zu spielen. Wir werfen den Schlamm umher und spritzen uns das Wasser uber den ganzen Korper. Aber pass auf! Wir wollen nicht auf die Lowen treffen.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E08 - Tern
programme.desc: We live by the water and build our nests in the sand on the shores. We like to live all together in a flock. We terns are able to fly soooooooo long above the ocean without landing. If we dont need to, we might not land at all. Flying is a blast! There are lots of different subspecies of tern. And were going to visit some of them today. We are all related. Its kind of like being in a big family.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E09 - Ants
programme.desc: Im a Green Tree Ant and I mainly live in the forests of Australia. We ants are incredibly strong, built for working hard and long. We must all work within the community to survive. We dont do anything just for fun and we always think about all the other ants and what is good for us all. We have to fight together for our place in the forest and to protect the most important ant in our community which is our queen.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E14 - Dingo
programme.desc: Hello, Im little dingo and my mummy will tell me the story of how I was born and how I live. Here we go - Once upon a time, in a country far, far away, called Australia......a huge and mysterious bird brought the soul of a little dingo down to the Earth......into his mummys tummy... and how did it continue? Listen to the whole story.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E15 - Clownfish
programme.desc: I love swimming around and playing in the waters of our tropical ocean. There is so much to explore and many colours and shapes. We live in the Sea Anemone and have a glossy coat. The Clown Fish has only three stripes on an orange body but some of our relatives have lots of stripes. Sometimes I like to look at the other fish but I think that the striped ones are the prettiest.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E16 - Cheetah
programme.desc: We are the fastest runners in the world. We hunt our dinner and when we do we can run only for a short distance, we must catch something fast; otherwise we have to stop. If we dont stop we can overheat, and thats a very dangerous condition for us. We also have an extra claw called an dew claw. When were chasing down a prey, we hook this claw around their legs to topple them over. We can do this running at our top speed. Cheetahs are recognizable by our black spots and they sure do suit us.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E17 - Crocodile
programme.desc: I am an alligator. No, not a crocodile - an alligator. When I got out of my egg I found myself in Australia which is the place where some of the biggest crocodiles in the world live. But they also live in other parts of the world too. And why are people afraid of crocodiles? Find out for yourself.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E18 - Echidna
programme.desc: Hello - Im an echidna - some people call us spiny anteaters. When I was born I came out of my Mums pouch. No, my spines didnt hurt her because I hatched from an egg and she kept me warm inside her pouch until I was ready to come out. It takes many days and nights, but a little echidna doesnt really notice the time passing, because its hidden away. Whilst waiting Mum will dig a nursery den in the ground, into which shell put her growing baby and once the baby is fully developed it can go explore the world. Adventures await!

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E19 - Kangaroo
programme.desc: We love our home in Australia. We love all types of grass, but there are some types we prefer more. Oh did I mention we love to jump? Every part of a kangaroos body is perfectly suited for skillful jumping. What is also special about us is that when we are small our mom carries us in her pouch isnt that cool?

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E20 - Kestrel
programme.desc: Hello! Im a kestrel and Ive a got a great view from our nest. My mummy is flying around here, somewhere. Kestrels are predators, which mean we eat meat. But we only hunt for things that are smaller than us like voles, mice, and even some insects. We settle in hollow trees or something similar and lay our eggs. From that point, it takes less than a month for us little kestrels to hatch.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E21 - Turtle
programme.desc: Turtle Mum usually just lays her eggs and leaves. Once we hatch, we have to take care of ourselves. From the moment we hatch, we know everything we need to know. We know what to do, where the ocean is, how to swim, and how to walk. Our goal is to get into the water. In the ocean, we are agile, and great swimmers. Were better at swimming than crawling around on land.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E22 - Zebra
programme.desc: Hello Im a little zebra. You say you already know about me? I live in Africa. Its nice and warm here, I like it a lot. Also, other animals live here with us and there is always something exciting going on. We are black and white and have stripes. When we come to waterholes we must be careful not to meet the crocodile because he would want to eat us. Even when there are a lot of us, we still walk together. We love to roll in the dust!

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E23 - My Friends From the Air
programme.desc: There are many birds in the world. You can hear their chattering, singing, cawing, and cackling across every continent. Do you think they will ever learn how to sing properly? And there are so many! Why dont they ever crash? Lets learn more about our bird friends!

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E24 - My Friends From Water
programme.desc: Take a deep breath and lets go under water. There are so many things and creatures to explore. There are all sorts of shapes and colours, and different ways of life. Each living thing: Humans and animals on dry land, fish living in water, birds, plants, and even insects - are all different. But most of us have three things in common: we breathe oxygen, eat, and breed. Lets look at some of our water animal friends.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E25 - My Friends From Savannah
programme.desc: A new day has begun on the savannah. Herds of gazelle, antelope, zebra, and all kinds of other animals move around to find fresh areas to graze. There are many species of animals living in Africa. They live on the seemingly endless plains of the savannah. Many animals you know from the zoo, live here in the wild. These wild animals like their freedom. They dont need us to take care of them. They live freely in the wilderness.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E26 - My Best Friends
programme.desc: Today we will remind everyone of what weve learned in all the previous episodes, about the different lives of our animal friends. They are all here. The koala, turtle, cheetah, crocodile, bear, zebra and the butterfly...what do you remember about them?

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E39 - A Century Of The Queen Mother 100 Years In 100 Minutes

But they also live in other parts of the world too. And why are people afraid of crocodiles? Find out for yourself.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E18 - Echidna
programme.desc: Hello - Im an echidna - some people call us spiny anteaters. When I was born I came out of my Mums pouch. No, my spines didnt hurt her because I hatched from an egg and she kept me warm inside her pouch until I was ready to come out. It takes many days and nights, but a little echidna doesnt really notice the time passing, because its hidden away. Whilst waiting Mum will dig a nursery den in the ground, into which shell put her growing baby and once the baby is fully developed it can go explore the world. Adventures await!

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E19 - Kangaroo
programme.desc: We love our home in Australia. We love all types of grass, but there are some types we prefer more. Oh did I mention we love to jump? Every part of a kangaroos body is perfectly suited for skillful jumping. What is also special about us is that when we are small our mom carries us in her pouch isnt that cool?

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E20 - Kestrel
programme.desc: Hello! Im a kestrel and Ive a got a great view from our nest. My mummy is flying around here, somewhere. Kestrels are predators, which mean we eat meat. But we only hunt for things that are smaller than us like voles, mice, and even some insects. We settle in hollow trees or something similar and lay our eggs. From that point, it takes less than a month for us little kestrels to hatch.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E21 - Turtle
programme.desc: Turtle Mum usually just lays her eggs and leaves. Once we hatch, we have to take care of ourselves. From the moment we hatch, we know everything we need to know. We know what to do, where the ocean is, how to swim, and how to walk. Our goal is to get into the water. In the ocean, we are agile, and great swimmers. Were better at swimming than crawling around on land.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E22 - Zebra
programme.desc: Hello Im a little zebra. You say you already know about me? I live in Africa. Its nice and warm here, I like it a lot. Also, other animals live here with us and there is always something exciting going on. We are black and white and have stripes. When we come to waterholes we must be careful not to meet the crocodile because he would want to eat us. Even when there are a lot of us, we still walk together. We love to roll in the dust!

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E23 - My Friends From the Air
programme.desc: There are many birds in the world. You can hear their chattering, singing, cawing, and cackling across every continent. Do you think they will ever learn how to sing properly? And there are so many! Why dont they ever crash? Lets learn more about our bird friends!

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E24 - My Friends From Water
programme.desc: Take a deep breath and lets go under water. There are so many things and creatures to explore. There are all sorts of shapes and colours, and different ways of life. Each living thing: Humans and animals on dry land, fish living in water, birds, plants, and even insects - are all different. But most of us have three things in common: we breathe oxygen, eat, and breed. Lets look at some of our water animal friends.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E25 - My Friends From Savannah
programme.desc: A new day has begun on the savannah. Herds of gazelle, antelope, zebra, and all kinds of other animals move around to find fresh areas to graze. There are many species of animals living in Africa. They live on the seemingly endless plains of the savannah. Many animals you know from the zoo, live here in the wild. These wild animals like their freedom. They dont need us to take care of them. They live freely in the wilderness.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E26 - My Best Friends
programme.desc: Today we will remind everyone of what weve learned in all the previous episodes, about the different lives of our animal friends. They are all here. The koala, turtle, cheetah, crocodile, bear, zebra and the butterfly...what do you remember about them?

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E39 - A Century Of The Queen Mother 100 Years In 100 Minutes
programme.desc: 100 years in 100 minutes

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E14 - Dingo
programme.desc: Hello, Im little dingo and my mummy will tell me the story of how I was born and how I live. Here we go - Once upon a time, in a country far, far away, called Australia......a huge and mysterious bird brought the soul of a little dingo down to the Earth......into his mummys tummy... and how did it continue? Listen to the whole story.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E15 - Clownfish
programme.desc: I love swimming around and playing in the waters of our tropical ocean. There is so much to explore and many colours and shapes. We live in the Sea Anemone and have a glossy coat. The Clown Fish has only three stripes on an orange body but some of our relatives have lots of stripes. Sometimes I like to look at the other fish but I think that the striped ones are the prettiest.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E16 - Cheetah
programme.desc: We are the fastest runners in the world. We hunt our dinner and when we do we can run only for a short distance, we must catch something fast; otherwise we have to stop. If we dont stop we can overheat, and thats a very dangerous condition for us. We also have an extra claw called an dew claw. When were chasing down a prey, we hook this claw around their legs to topple them over. We can do this running at our top speed. Cheetahs are recognizable by our black spots and they sure do suit us.

programme.title: My Animal Friends - S01:E17 - Crocodile

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E06 - Now or Never
programme.desc: Con los nimos levantados, los hermanos Keefer se disponen a avistar y acechar una manada de caribes cercana, pero acercarse resulta ms difcil de lo esperado.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E07 - Cache Out
programme.desc: Con la carne roja, los hermanos Keefer consiguen por fin reponer sus agotadas energas, pero no son los nicos que buscan sobrevivir al invierno en las tierras salvajes de Alaska.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E08 - Bearing Down
programme.desc: La dura realidad del invierno se impone, y los hermanos Keefer se ven obligados a dormir con un ojo abierto mientras un oso pardo patrulla los alrededores de su campamento.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E09 - Head to Head
programme.desc: Con la tormenta rtica pisndoles los talones, los hermanos Keefer corren ro abajo para llegar a su siguiente deposito de suministros, pero se pierden cuando el ro se divide en un laberinto de pequeos canales.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E10 - Edge of the Storm
programme.desc: Cuando las temperaturas caen en picado, los hermanos Keefer se abren paso ro abajo a traves de aguas heladas y fuertes vientos en contra con la esperanza de llegar al lugar de extraccion antes de que la tormenta rtica lo reclame.

programme.title: Survival Science - - S01:E03 - Surviving a Bear Attack
programme.desc: Nick y Laura ponen a prueba la potencia y velocidad de los osos pardos utilizando herramientas de acrobatas de Hollywood para experimentar un ataque. Adems: un intento de recrear el disparo de una flecha que salvo a un hombre del ataque de un oso.

programme.title: Survival Science - S01:E04 - Surviving a Mountain Lion Attack
programme.desc: Laura y Nick desmenuzan los comportamientos, la fuerza, la vista y la velocidad de los pumas mediante experimentos y exploran tecnicas para hacer frente a estos depredadores pice.

programme.title: Survival Science - S01:E05 - Surviving a Lightning Strike
programme.desc: Laura y Nick determinan el poder que tienen los rayos y como se comportan en un Laboratorio de Pruebas de Rayos de Efectos Directos de ltima generacion. Ofrecen consejos a cazadores y pescadores para protegerse de ellos.

programme.title: Survival Science - S01:E06 - ATV Accidents
programme.desc: Laura y Nick preparan unas espectaculares pruebas de ATV a alta velocidad para ver como se producen los accidentes y que hacer para protegerse de los daos.

programme.title: Survival Science - S01:E07 - Treestand Accidents
programme.desc: Explorando por que ocurren los accidentes de treestand y como prevenirlos.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S01:E02 - C.J. Wickersham Story
programme.desc: En este episodio de Lucha por sobrevivir escuchamos la desgarradora historia de C.J. Wickersham que luchar por sobrevivir al ataque de un tiburon mientras pescaba con arpon.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S01:E03 - Jamey Mosch
programme.desc: Seguimos al cazador Jamey Mosch en los Everglades de Florida mientras su viaje de caza se convierte en una pesadilla de cuatro das.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S01:E04 - Craig Hutto
programme.desc: Un viaje familiar de pesca se convierte en una sangrienta pesadilla y deja a Craig Hutto luchando por su vida.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S01:E05 - Ron Smith Story
programme.desc: La historia real del encuentro de Ron Smith con un intrepido ciervo que les ataco a el y a su sobrino, Arik, mientras estaban pescando.

programme.desc: Nick y Laura ponen a prueba la potencia y velocidad de los osos pardos utilizando herramientas de acrobatas de Hollywood para experimentar un ataque. Adems: un intento de recrear el disparo de una flecha que salvo a un hombre del ataque de un oso.

programme.title: Survival Science - S01:E04 - Surviving a Mountain Lion Attack

programme.title: Survival Science - S01:E05 - Surviving a Lightning Strike
